statements: SELECT * FROM NetWorth
SELECT id, assets FROM NetWorth WHERE id = 1
SELECT SUM(assets) AS total_assets FROM NetWorth
SELECT * FROM NetWorth ORDER BY assets DESC
SELECT id, liabilities, investments FROM NetWorth WHERE assets > liabilities
SELECT * FROM NetWorth WHERE assets > liabilities
SELECT id, investments FROM NetWorth ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT SUM(assets) AS total_assets FROM NetWorth
SELECT * FROM NetWorth WHERE investments > 5000 ORDER BY liabilities ASC
SELECT id, assets, liabilities, investments FROM NetWorth WHERE assets + investments > liabilities
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM liabilities WHERE liability_amount <= 500;
SELECT liability_name, liability_amount FROM liabilities WHERE liability_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC
SELECT liability_name, ROUND(liability_amount, 2) AS rounded_amount FROM liabilities WHERE liability_amount < 5000
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM assets INNER JOIN liabilities ON assets.asset_id = liabilities.liability_id
SELECT * FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%Stock%';
SELECT SUM(asset_value) AS total_assets_value FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE id = 7
SELECT investment_name, investment_value FROM investments ORDER BY investment_value DESC
SELECT liability_name FROM liabilities WHERE liability_value < 5000
SELECT * FROM assets JOIN investments ON assets.id = investments.id
SELECT * FROM assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 100000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%tech%';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 10000 ORDER BY asset_name DESC
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, SUM(asset_value) AS total_value FROM assets GROUP BY asset_name, asset_type ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT * FROM liabilities WHERE liability_value < 5000 ORDER BY liability_name ASC
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND investment_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY investment_name DESC
SELECT * FROM net_worth WHERE assets_sum > liabilities_sum AND investments_sum > 50000 ORDER BY net_worth_value DESC
SELECT * FROM Assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM Assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT asset_name FROM Assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Liabilities ORDER BY liability_value DESC;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_value FROM Investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC, asset_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Assets WHERE asset_value > 1000 AND asset_value < 5000 ORDER BY asset_name;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM Assets JOIN Investments ON Assets.asset_id = Investments.investment_id WHERE Investments.investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM Liabilities WHERE liability_value <> 0 ORDER BY liability_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value, total_assets, net_worth FROM Assets JOIN NetWorth ON Assets.asset_id = NetWorth.net_worth_id ORDER BY total_assets DESC, net_worth ASC;
